sentences.english: Thenceforth, M. Madeleine was transfigured in Fantine's eyes.
sentences.chinese: 從此馬德蘭先生在芳汀的心目中是另外一個人了。

sentences.english: But that is not the sort of reading I have in mind.
sentences.chinese: 然而，我心目中的閱讀不屬於這一種。

sentences.english: The beautiful sky was the home of his heart.
sentences.chinese: 這美麗的天空是它心目中的老家。

sentences.english: In Chinese opinion, panda signifies peace.
sentences.chinese: 熊貓在中國人的心目中象徵着和平。

sentences.english: Compare to Eliot's city, Eliot's sense of the city, this one.
sentences.chinese: 和現實相比，他心目中的城市就是這張照片上。

sentences.english: I've got to call my mom and tell her I just found the girl I'm going to marry.
sentences.chinese: 我得打電話給我老媽，告訴她我找到了心目中的新娘。

sentences.english: I know that is the prince in my heart, but he is not my.
sentences.chinese: 我知道，他是我心目中的王子，但他從不屬於我。

sentences.english: In my mind, it helps me avoid misery and find out the happiness.
sentences.chinese: 在我的心目裏，它可以幫我屏除煩惱，尋到快樂。

sentences.english: "- the people's victim and life-long bond-slave, as they fancied her, might say to them.
sentences.chinese: 人們心目中的這個犧牲品和終身奴僕會對他們這樣說。

sentences.english: The dragon enjoys a very high reputation in Chinese culture.
sentences.chinese: 龍在中國人的心目中享有很高的地位。

sentences.english: The mother I had in mind for myself was middle-aged with brown hair pulled back in a bun .
sentences.chinese: 我心目中的母親是梳粑粑頭的棕發中年婦人。

sentences.english: In their minds, effort is synonymous with discomfort.
sentences.chinese: 在他們心目中，努力是不適的同義詞。

sentences.english: The problem bulks large in his mind .
sentences.chinese: 這個問題在他的心目中顯得重要。

sentences.english: His dream was to meet his favourite pop star face to face.
sentences.chinese: 他的夢想是要面對面地見見他心目中的流行曲歌星。

sentences.english: No matter how other people that I have in mind the No. 1 hero, is Qiao Feng.
sentences.chinese: 不管別人怎麼說，我心目中的第一號英雄，就是喬峯。

sentences.english: But in common people's mind, the Jiangchuan public security's image is suffers a disastrous decline.
sentences.chinese: 而在老百姓的心目中，江川公安的形象更是一落千丈。

definition: central point/in one's thoughts/in one's heart
to enter deeply into people's hearts/to have a real impact on the people (idiom)
to honor sb as a God (idiom); to revere/to worship/to deify/to make a holy cow of sth/to put sb on a pedestal
to admire/to revere/to look up to
